arts.ttl: Malic goal secures Sturm Graz win over RB Leipzig
arts.sum: 19-year-old Arjan Malic scores his first goal in Europe as lowly Sturm Graz pick up their second win of the Champions League campaign against fellow struggles RB Leipzig.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig's Champions League misery ended with defeat against Sturm Graz
arts.sum: RB Leipzig bow out of the Champions League with a defeat at Austrian Bundesliga leaders Sturm Graz.

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: Sturm Graz vs. RB Leipzig
arts.sum: As Sturm Graz and RB Leipzig hope to close their European campaign with a win, the lineups are out for the Merkur Arena clash.

arts.ttl: Sturm Graz vs. RB Leipzig: UEFA Champions League probable teams, match stats and LIVE blog!
arts.sum: There's nothing to play for when RB Leipzig travel to Sturm Graz in the UEFA Champions League on Wednesday, but that won't deter the away side from going for glory in their final fixture of the league phase (kick-off: 9pm CET). Benjamin Šeško has four Champions League goals this season, with only Christopher Nkunku scoring more in a single campaign for Leipzig (seven in 2021/22).

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig’s Eljaf Elmas heading to Serie A on loan with purchase option
arts.sum: Sky Germany is currently reporting that RB Leipzig have found a taker for transfer bust Eljif Elmas.

arts.ttl: Sturm Graz vs. RB Leipzig preview: Team news and predicted lineups
arts.sum: Here is our preview of Wednesday's Champions League clash between Sturm Graz and RB Leipzig, including our predicted lineups.

arts.ttl: Torino set to complete moves for Eljif Elmas and Cesare Casadei
arts.sum: Serie A side Torino seem set to completely the signature of two players in Chelsea’s Cesare Casadei and RB Leipzig’s Eljif Elmas. Gianluca di Marzio has reported that Elmas, who…

arts.ttl: Exclusive: How Arsenal feel about signing Benjamin Sesko from RB Leipzig after holding talks
arts.sum: In their search for a new striker, Arsenal have now accepted that it won’t be possible to sign Benjamin Sesko from RB Leipzig this month,...
